name: Single Point Perspective Gallery
description:
New art on every click.

There are only lines drawn towards a single vanishing point. This vanishing point moves in a cirle or ellipse across the entire screen. So this artwork looks different on different screens (You can try to make the browser window smaller).  

Created for the genuary prompt on January 25th 2022. See: https://genuary.art/

Made in JavaScript only.
